name: Space Escape!
description: You're an astronaut who stole a international galactic spaceship and took it for a joyride. Thrown into space prison, it's time for your high speed escape!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD Turion Dual-Core RM-75 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: M-Audio AV40
